response.overview: Amelia and Pippo are reunited after several decades to perform their old music-hall act, imitating Fred Astaire and Ginger Rogers, on a TV variety show.
response.tagline: The movie that watches television through the eyes of Fellini.
response.title: Ginger and Fred

cast.name: Settimio Scacco
cast.character: Man in Costume in the Backstage (uncredited)

cast.name: Elisabetta Barbagallo
cast.character: Short Haired Girl in the Backstage (uncredited)
